p: A2780 cells were seeded at 1 × 10 5 cells/well in 6-wellplate overnight before being treated with either A. membranacea or 1,8-cineole essential oils at four concentrations ranged from 0 to 50 μg/mL, or 0 to 1 µM, respectively. Cells were then suspended by trypsin-EDTA and spun at 200× g for 5 min. Collected cell pellets were washed in ice-cold PBS before they were fixed in 70% ice-cold ethanol overnight. The cell cycle analysis was then performed and analyzed for 20,000 events per sample, using flow cytometry (FC500, BC, USA), following the protocol described elsewhere [ 45, 46].
